content.raw:
I’m seeing an issue where I open blacs with a tab that has a remote worker, without launching labscript\_utils.remote. The tab fails to start, of course, but after starting the remote server and attempting to restart the tab, the whole GUI crashes.

Edit: Similarly, if I start with a working tab, then close the server, attempting to restart the tab kills the GUI.

This is tested using test.py in IMAQdxCamera.
content.html:
I’m seeing an issue where I open blacs with a tab that has a remote worker, without launching labscript_utils.remote. The tab fails to start, of course, but after starting the remote server and attempting to restart the tab, the whole GUI crashes.

Edit: Similarly, if I start with a working tab, then close the server, attempting to restart the tab kills the GUI.

This is tested using test.py in IMAQdxCamera.
